title: How to get Android music player to play from new memory card - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, it depends on which music player you're using. Most will require you to go to their settings and add the memory card to the folders and library from which the player will index the songs. Or maybe your music player could be at fault. Try out Poweramp. It's the best music player I've found for android so far and see if it gives you the same troubles
Use the music player to open the music on your memory card. It would depend on your Android system and the app you are using.
